title: Customer Experience Practical Competency Enhancement: Quantitative Analysis of Social Research Methodology: Blended Learning-Based Course

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can explain and apply basic statistical techniques (mean, standard deviation, correlation, etc.) for analyzing social phenomena.
Learners can interpret the logical structure of quantitative research designs and apply them to real-case analyses using e-learning platforms.
Learners enhance their ability to process complex data step-by-step through micro-content provided in mobile environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
